references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. R. J. Asveld, Fibonacci-like differential equations with a polynomial nonhomogeneous term, Fib. Quart. 27 (1989), 303-309.
formula: E.g.f.: log(1+x)/(1-log(1+x)-log(1+x)^2). a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Stirling1(n, k)*k!*Fibonacci(k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 29 2003a(n) ~ n! * (-1)^(n+1) * (1+1/sqrt(5)) * exp(n*(1+sqrt(5))/2) /(2*(exp((1+sqrt(5))/2)-1)^(n+1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 01 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, k!*fibonacci(k)*stirling(n, k, 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 30 2015
author: _Simon Plouffe_
